snippet: The photographer Todd Heisler walked the perimeter of Manhattan over the course of one day.
abstract: Photographer Todd Heisler joins writer Cy Adler on 32-mile walk around perimeter of Manhattan, event that Adler hosts on a Sunday each May with his group Shorewalkers; Heisler holds that while route offers unique perspective on landmarks and topography, people are what make experience so rich.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Todd Heisler walked the perimeter of Manhattan over the course of one day.

headline.main: Once Around an Island: Walking Manhattan’s Perimeter
